What's the point of making sequels if it's the same exact thing all over again? The real pity here is not even the current situation, it's what will happen later. Clearly, the protagonist will never be able to trust anyone after this, possibly developing trauma. To be honest, a sequel where he learns to cope with his past will definitely be far more interesting than this unoriginal and repetitive mess. Right now, the one who has to move on is not the protagonist but the author.

This manga seems to me with very good art but it irritates me too much the protagonist is a complete fag, in this manga the antagonist his friend gives him the opportunity to fuck his beloved whenever he wants with the freedoms he wants (I add him to the group of sexual friends ) Instead of conquering her by demonstrating his sexual desire, he decides to get scared and look pathetically bad after a single push, I understand that it could happen to you once but already two and also after that always run away, man, do something, kiss her, caress her, recover and keep fighting for your girl (or will it be that he only gets one shot, I can't believe that), in other netarare manga I have seen that the protagonist leaves his life fighting until the end, but here the mc has everything served and does nothing, I glad that the girl begins to think better what she wants, in the next chapter I think we will see a very rough sex camp in the house of the blonde, after this she will not have a chanc

este manga me parece con muy buen arte pero me irrita demasiado el protagonista es un completo maricón, en este manga el antagonista su amigo le da la oportunidad de follarse a su amada cuando quiera con las libertades que quiera (lo agrego al grupo de amigos sexuales) en vez de conquistarla demostrando su deseo sexual decide asustarse y quedar patéticamente mal tras un solo empujón, entiendo que te pueda pasar una vez pero ya dos y ademas después de eso siempre salir corriendo hombre has algo, bésala acariciarla recuperate y sigue luchando por tu chica (o sera que solo le da para un disparo, no puedo cree eso), en otros mangas netorare he visto que el protagonista se deja la vida y aun así pierde luchando hasta el final, pero aquí el tío tiene todo servido y no hace nada, me alegra que la chica empiece a pensar mejor lo que desea, en el siguiente capitulo creo que veremos un campamento de sexo muy rudo en la casa del rubio, después de esto ya no tendrá ni una oportunidad
Just move on dude, you lost from the start...
